item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:104 Chances: Oracle has been recognized as a Leader in cloud database management by Gartner, showcasing its strong position in the industry. The company is introducing new capabilities to its cloud enterprise applications, indicating potential for growth and innovation. The general availability of the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Generative AI service and new innovations in generative AI present opportunities for enterprise use cases and market expansion.
